channel.title: Certain skill lvl to enter portal?
channel.description: how do i make it so you have to have a certain skill lvl to enter a portal?

item.title: Certain skill lvl to enter portal?
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

ok and if there not 99 agility, how can i make it say you need 99 agility to enter portal?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 05:02:34 PM[/size][hr]hello?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 05:11:24 PM[/size][hr]btw i got this error.

here is the code you gave me.

case 4408: // attackportal if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3511; sendMessage("99 Attack Guild"); break;

Whats the problem?

Read full topic

acutly runevault your wrong its something like this

item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

hmm so like this???

if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) {
case 6461: // trainportal
teleportToX = 3087;
teleportToY = 3511;
sendMessage(“you teleport to the training area.”);
break;
}

item.dc:creator: @Plazftw Plazftw
item.description:
@Plazftw wrote:

They told you for the 3rd time here:

if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) { // your portal code here }
You have your portal code and you put it where it says //portal code here and then compile and it should work.
